command.say.desc.content:
Make me say anything! Almost... anything.

Right, if you have `MANAGE_CHANNELS` permissions you can use these flags:

`-edit: message` - *edit an exisiting message that %BOT_USERNAME% sent*,
`-reply: message` - *reply to messages in the current channel*,
`-channel: #channel` - *send your message to any channel*

to decide where the message end up, and also create embeds! (`-embed` flag)
On top of that you can alter input text with these flags:

`-owo|-uwu|-uvu (intensity)` - *indensifwies teh owowowo effect*,
`flip` - *flips the text upside down*

And on top of all that, you can change embed appearance with these flags:

`-c: #hex` - *hex color*,
`-avatar` - *adds the authors avatar to the embed thumbnail*,
`-guildicon` - *adds the guild icon to the embed thumbnail*,
`-timestamp` - *adds a timestamp to the embed*

But if you dont have the mentioned permissions, you can still use the
command just a bit more limited, you can use the `-owo|-uwu|-uvu` flags and
obviously cannot send messages to other channels. (Or reply to them)

*This is what you can do: `%CUSTOM_PREFIX%say -uvu|-uwu|-owo hello friend`*

command.reactionroles.desc.content:
You must provide one of these options (`<action>`): `add|create|setup`,`remove`,`list`,`flag`,`move`,`fix`
*(add, create and setup all do the same)*

And if you know the syntax you can provide `[args]` right away,
otherwise follow the prompts.

All of the commands have prompts and will guide you **EXCEPT**
the flag commands, unfortunately the way these are done its
impossible to add prompts to them and you'll have to send all
arguments at once *(%CUSTOM_PREFIX%rr flag add flag messageID)*, otherwise it
will just tell you to resend the command.

**If you kick/ban %BOT_USERNAME% your data will be
deleted after 7d and cannot be recovered.**

**WARNING:** the `%BOT_USERNAME%` role must be above all roles you
intend to use, otherwise it wont give/remove any roles.
One more thing, currently you can only use custom emoji for RRs
I have a fix planned and it should be coming soon.
command.reactionroles.args.start:
What action would you like to perform?

`add|create|setup`,`remove`,`list`,`flag`,`move`,`fix`
command.reactionroles.args.retry:
Sorry, I didnt quite get that, what would you like to do?

`add|create|setup`,`remove`,`list`,`flag`,`move`,`fix`
command.reactionroleflagsadd.desc.conten:
You must provide one of these flags (`<flag>`): `selfdestruct`,`verify`,`lock`,`reverse`

SelfDestruct is the only flag that takes in options, example:
`%CUSTOM_PREFIX%rr flag add selfdestruct 10 messageID`

The number input determines at how many reactions
the message is going to- well... self destruct.

`Verify` flag will only allow the roles to be given out, not taken away.
`Lock` flag will lock the reaction from giving out or removing any roles.
`Reverse` flag will remove roles when the user reacts and give roles when they remove a reaction.

**WARNING: You must send all arguments at once, unfortunately,
the way this command works doesnt allow for prompts.**
command.reactionroleflagsadd.args.sdflag: Minimum cannot be lower then `1` or higher then `1000`
command.reactionroleflagsadd.args.messag: What message would you like to add your flag to?
Sorry, I didnt quite get that, what message would you like to add your flag to?
command.reactionroleflagsadd.noFlags.con:
You need to give me at least one flag to add.
Please re-send or edit your message.

*%CUSTOM_PREFIX%rr flag add `selfdestruct/verify/lock/reverse` message*
command.reactionroleflagsadd.incompatibl: To use other flags please remove the **Self Destruct** flag from your message.
command.reactionroleflagsadd.noRR: That message doesn't have any **Reaction Roles** attached to it.
command.reactionroleflagsremove.desc.con:
You must provide one of these flags (`<flag>`): `selfdestruct`,`verify`,`lock`,`reverse`

**WARNING: You must send all arguments at once, unfortunately,
the way this command works doesnt allow for prompts.**

You need to give me at least one flag to remove.
Please re-send or edit your message.

*%CUSTOM_PREFIX%rr flag remove `selfdestruct/verify/lock/reverse` message
command.reactionroleflagsremove.noRR: That message doesn't have any **Reaction Roles** attached to it.
command.reactionroleadd.desc.content:
You must provide all arguments in this command but you can let it
guide you and send arguments step by step.

**WARNING:** the `%BOT_USERNAME%` role must be above all roles you
intend to give out, otherwise it wont work.

command.reactionrolemove.desc.content:
You must provide both arguments for this command to work.
**WARNING: it must be in the exact order as shown in the example below**
command.reactionrolemove.args.start:
What RR would you like to move? And what message to move it to? *(old and new message ID required)*

example: `.rr move ID1 ID2`%NOTE- dont translate commands, kinda obvious but yeah...%
command.reactionrolemove.args.retry: Sorry I didnt quite get that, please give me 2 message IDs.
command.reactionrolemove.nooriginalmessa: Sorry, I couldn't find the original message.
command.reactionrolemove.nonewmessage.co: Sorry, I couldn't find the new message.
command.reactionrolemove.noemoji.content:
emoji,
you will have to recreate%NOTE- message id%
command.reactionrolemove.success.content: Success! You moved all reaction roles from%NOTE- old message id%
Btw you'll have to remove the old reactions yourself (if there are any), just in case you accidentally moved the RR.
command.reactionroleslist.desc.content:
You can list all reaction roles from this guild if you
don't provide any arguments, but if you provide the `[message]`
id you can check a specific message up close.
command.reactionroleslist.args.start: What message would you like to inspect? *(send the message id)*
command.reactionroleslist.args.retry: Sorry, I didnt quite get that, what message would you like to inspect? *(send the message id)*
command.reactionroleslist.nomessage.cont: That message isn't bound to any reaction.
command.reactionroleslist.listEmbed.desc: You currently have%NOTE- reaction role count, just a number%

reaction role(s)
assigned to this message.

**Tip:** Use `%CUSTOM_PREFIX%rr list <ID>` to check reaction
roles for a specific message.
command.reactionroleslist.norrsaved.cont: There are no Reaction Roles saved for this guild.
nsfw.couldntFetch.content: Sorry I couldnt fetch new images, please try again later.
command.deletecmdafter.desc.content:
Should the bot delete commands after theyre sent?
Most commands have a timer to them that deletes
them after some time (usually 30s).
If you set this option to `no` the bot wont delete command messages.
command.deletecmdafter.infoEmbed.desc.co: Delete commands after they're sent:%NOTE- yes or no%
**UPDATED:** Should commands be deleted after use:%NOTE- yes or no%
temp.unused: This line isnt ever used and you dont have to translate it, its just here so i can easily copy paste lines without having to think about commas
